name: Dormant Lands
description:
In Dormant Lands you are able to control the time progression of the level by using a slider to set the time of the level.

To complete the level you have to get all the characters in the level to an end point by the levels end time. You have indirect control over the characters by giving making them either walk or jump to a point. There are traps and obstacles that the player will need to avoid in order to finish the level.

There are 12 levels in the current version I'm planning on adding to that number in the near future if people like the game.
